settings.heading: When you send vegan and gluten-free gifts, everyone can enjoy them.   Create great karma with delicious company-branded, corporate gifts to your employees, clients, and at trade shows.

settings.text:
Celebrate and show your gratitude to

  • Clients
  • Vendors
  • Partners or Employees (Appreciation Day, anyone?)

with sweet gifts EVERYONE can enjoy!

Include anyone and everyone with your promotional launches, thank you gifts, marketing blitzes, and more.

Karma Baker gifts are inclusive to all – regardless of many dietary restrictions.

We can customize cookies, cakesicles, donuts or cupcake jars.

Bring us your inspired ideas and we will work with you to create a fun gift that everyone can eat!

settings.heading: STEP 1
settings.row_content: View gift ideas from our menu here. We’re happy to create a custom gift package, please contact us.

settings.heading: STEP 2
settings.row_content: Fill out the information below – you will be contacted by a Corporate Events team member within 24 hours.

settings.heading: STEP 3
settings.row_content: We will send out your gift boxes on your desired date and make you look good in the process.

settings.heading: What is the minimum order for corporate gifting?
settings.row_content:
Our Corporate orders team will handle your orders of 15+ gift boxes.
For custom gifting, the gift minimum is 30+ orders. If you are ordering less than 15 gifts boxes, please visit our nationwide shipping menu and place your order directly online.

settings.heading: When should I place my order?
settings.row_content:
• Standard Orders (non-customized) – 2 weeks
  • Custom Gift Orders – 3 weeks

  • Please allow an extra week for customizations.
  • Rush order fees may apply. Please contact us at orders@karmabaker.com for deadline questions or inquiries.

settings.heading: Do you offer custom gifts?
settings.row_content: Yes! We can customize your goodies with your company’s logo for an additional charge per gift. Please email orders@karmabaker.com with your images for a quote.

settings.heading: What is the shipping turnaround time + cost?
settings.row_content: We offer a Fedex 2-day flat-rate shipping cost of $15 per package. Packages arrive 2 days after they’re shipped. We only ship Mondays through Wednesday to ensure delivery. We recommend shipping earlier than later.

settings.heading: Do you offer a Corporate Discount?
settings.row_content:
We do, our corporate discount is based on spend.
Orders of $1,000+ receive 10% off (product only)
If you wish to become a frequent-sender, contact us for a personal coupon code to use at checkout.

settings.heading: Can we include gift notes?
settings.row_content:
Yes, we can customize your gift boxes with personalized notes. We use our own cute Karma Baker cards, or you may have your company’s printed cards sent to us at
1145 Lindero Canyon Rd D3 Westlake Village, CA 91362
Please have notes arrive at least 3 days before your designated ship-out date.
